attributes.action: Insist the FA reinstate Steve McClaren as England Manager
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Steve McClaren has done a magnificent job in ensuring that England will not take part in Euro 2008. As a result of his selfless dedication, the country will be spared the ordeal of having to watch endless football in the summer of 2008 and the sight of hundreds of Ford Fiesta cars with flags driving erratically around housing estates

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
